attributes.action: set up a Royal Commision to review the workings of Parliament and the need for a British Constitution and Bill of Rights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the current parlous state of Parliament and the lack of leadership from this Government to resolve the situation, there is an urgent need to undertake a thorough, independent review of the workings of Parliament and the need for a British Constitution and Bill of Rights.
